title: Dodging in ARAM...
body:
Could we start getting penalties for people that dodge aram games because the RANDOM champion they get isn't what they wanted?

Its HOW THE GAME MODE WORKS. RANDOM CHAMPIONS.

Really starting to piss alot of players off

replies.body:
They already suffer a 5 minute penalty, and lose their rerolls if they used any.

What more could you need?

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tq8hmbAG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-14T07:37:57.408+0000)
>
> They already suffer a 5 minute penalty, and lose their rerolls if they used any.
> 
> What more could you need?

Seriously, is that all? When I get my favourite champ once in a blue moon and someone dodges when I get them again, I get so tilted. Ban them from aram for a week and guarantee that they get the same champ they dodged on the next time they play aram.
Riot really only focus most of their attention on ranked tbh. I would like that too but I don't see it happening too sooner rather than later
